debates.summary: First proposal rejected. 6,000 tez invoice considered excessive.
First proposal period rejection. Got 3.5%, needed 5%.
Baking Accounts removed due to undocumented breaking changes.
Introduced Liquidity Bakingâ€”most debated feature in Tezos history. Subsidizes tzBTC/XTZ pool.
Extended LB sunset by ~10 months. Ongoing community division.
Redesigned LB 'Escape Hatch' into 'Toggle Vote' for ongoing preference.
Timelocks disabled due to security vulnerability allowing proof forgery.
MAJOR REJECTION. Failed supermajority due to Adaptive Issuance complexity, staking concerns, and bugs. Oxford 2 passed with AI disabled.
Reintroduced AI with major revisions after extensive Agora feedback from Oxford rejection.
Two variants (A/B) proposed. B reduced delegated weight from 50% to 33%.
